markdownRemark.html:
Accomplishments

• Awarded the Best Education Hack among over 800 other participants [devpost.com/software/lectr-me-4nlmxt] • Developed an audio manipulation algorithm to optimize online learning for university students in Python, using an interface written in PHP, hosted on a Apache web server over a 2-day period • Presented and pitched the new product to multiple industry professionals, with a 100% approval rating
